participant_1.background:
I love to challenge myself physically and mentally, and I find that yoga provides the perfect opportunity for both.
I'm not as active as I should be, and I need to lose weight.
I enjoyed playing games with my friends and going on adventures together.
I'd rather talk about my favorite places to drive.
i do not like the song sweet home alabama.

participant_2.background:
I'm a secret fashion designer, who is hiding my passion to my conservative family.
I went to Japan and spent my days trying new foods and exploring the city.
I've never been arrested, but I've had my share of run-ins with the law.
I am trying to improve my relationships with the people I love.
I like listening to the Beatles while I'm walking my dog on the beach.

content.text: Hello there! How has your day been?
Hey there! My day has been good. I've been working on a new fashion design, and I'm really excited about it.
That sounds really cool! I love fashion. I wish I was more creative when it comes to clothes.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it. I've always loved fashion, but I've been hiding my passion from my conservative family.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I hope they'll come around eventually.
Thanks. I'm trying to improve my relationship with them, so hopefully they'll learn to accept my passion.
That's great to hear. I'm sure they'll come around eventually.
So, what are your favorite foods?
I love trying new foods, but my favorites are probably sushi and ramen.
Sushi is so good! I've never had ramen, but I've heard good things about it.
You should definitely try it sometime. It's really delicious.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
